on reading compounds: 期【キ】period, time, age, term (e.g. in office), period, session (e.g. of parliament), stage (e.g. disease)
期日【キジツ】fixed date, settlement date
期す【ゴス】to expect, to hope for, to look forward to, to foresee, to anticipate, to resolve (to do), to decide upon, to prepare for, to promise, to pledge
一期【イチゴ】one's life time, lifetime
非業の最期【ヒゴウノサイゴ】unnatural death, violent death
